description:
Fifteen years have passed since the start of the war.  A small band of warriors have set out to defeat the Demon King, but when the Hero, all alone reaches his target, gets more than what he expected.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Kono Ware no Mono to Nare, Yuusha yo" "Kotowaru!"
You Will Be Mine, Hero. I Refuse!
｢この我のものとなれ, 勇者よ｣｢断る!｣
